name: Steps Into The Darkness 2 DEMO
description:
The return of the horrible hardcore platformer Steps Into The Darkness!
Now with sound, music and proper level design!

Jump, hang off ledges, run and even fight your way through the corrupted darkness around you!

A mix of fast reaction time, precise movement and patience is going to be required to get out of this dark prison.


To addition to new movement options, we have a lot of new items, obstacles and even permanent upgrades! They'll serve you well on your adventure. And some will make the climb significantly harder too.


Already beat the game? How about one of the many challenge modes! 5 out of the planned 18 challenge modes are available in the demo! Mix them together to make the game even harder and increase your high scores!

Did I mention the many unlockable secrets and customization options? All sorts of different trails are going to make your adventure just a bit brighter and prettier!
Can't pick one? Favourite your, well, favourites and set your trail to random!


Save files! You can have up to five different runs at once! No need to give up your fully completed file to start a challenge run.

The demo contains the first two locations, one of the boss fights, five challenges and a possibility to unlock 13 out of the total 29 trails!
